description.value:
Special: Flame, Shocking, Warp Weapon

Note: Never reloads, gains 1 shot per 10 damage dealt, target killed, or hour spent within area of intense warp activity. Wielder can make -10 Willpower Test to regain one shot, if fail suffer 1d5 Willpower Damage per DoF. Custom made, if original owner, don't need to Brace.
